forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 31. Northwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 53. Southeast wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening deepens, Boston sits quietly under a wide expanse of clear night sky, the gentle touch of a northwest breeze barely stirring the air. The temperature, dipping toward the chill of thirty-one degrees, invites a brisk sharpness that urges one to wrap up snugly against the evening cool. The distant cityscape, a constellation of twinkling lights, offers a tranquil view, a comforting reminder of humanity's pulse amidst the stillness.

Looking ahead to Monday, dawn promises a gentle rise in warmth wrapped in the embrace of sunlight. With a high beckoning near fifty-three, the day unfolds invitingly, perfect for leisurely walks along the Charles or a quiet moment in one of Boston's charming parks. A southeast breeze, mild and inviting, will accompany this sunlit respite from chill. To embrace the pleasantness of the day, dress in layers—the perfect attire for slipping off a warm jacket as the sun climbs higher. Whether you find solace in reading at a café terrace or exploring the history of the Freedom Trail, these mundane pleasures will enrich the canvas of your day, crafting moments that linger long after the sun dips below the horizon once more.
